item.title: XmAs ShOoTeR
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Purely from java.awt takes a lot of damn time and ran into things I still have to learn! Project is still on going and will post on my github soon enough. Also looking at how to get it on a webpage. Maybe I can use the engine/setup for next years contest.

Not to mention I keep forgetting about these boards… urgh

Read full topic
